text:
Kaitlyn Bristowe Voted In as the Bachelorette

03:02 | 05.19.15 | TV-14 | CC

Chris Harrison reveals that Kaitlyn Bristowe will be the new Bachelorette. Harrison sent Britt Nilsson home moments before, after the votes from the contestants were tallied and Kaitlyn received the most votes. Oh, also, she has to get inside so she can prep for the first Rose Ceremony, which she was not anticipating would be on the schedule for the evening. From Part 2 of the the 2015 season premiere of The Bachelorette.
